content.38/f Penny 2500/t 1900 2400/n pennySpa: echos/-1000 -1000/farmer 13 23 2 Penny 9 29 1/swimming farmer/swimming Penny/skippable/showFrame Penny 31/viewport 13 27 true/pause 2000/playSound slosh/move farmer 0 6 3/positionOffset farmer 0 16/pause 700/speak Penny "你來了……我還擔心你沒收到我的字條呢。$6"/playSound slosh/move Penny 1 0 1/pause 1500/faceDirection Penny 0/speak Penny "看來只有我們在這裡。$8"/pause 800/speak Penny "這裡的水感覺真清涼，對吧？$6"/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 1300/faceDirection Penny 1/pause 500/playSound slosh/move Penny 1 0 1/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Penny "$q -1 null#你知道我今晚約你出來的原因嗎？$8#$r -1 0 event_pool1#你有話想對我說。#$r -1 0 event_pool2#我不大清楚。#$r -1 0 event_pool3#你想見穿著泳裝的我。"/faceDirection Penny 3/pause 800/faceDirection Penny 1/speak Penny "呃，該怎麼說呢……$8"/pause 1000/playSound slosh/move Penny 1 0 1/pause 500/speak Penny "我有句話想對你說很久了……是有關我的感受的。$8#$b#我總是不由自主地想著你……$8#$b#我從未對任何人有過這種感覺。$8"/speak Penny "$q -1 null#……$8#$r -1 0 event_pool4#我對你也有同樣的感受。#$r -1 -1500 event_pool5#抱歉，但是我對你沒有這種感覺……"/fork pennyHeartbroken/pause 1000/showFrame Penny 32/pause 200/playSound slosh/positionOffset Penny 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Penny 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Penny 2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Penny 2 0/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Penny 2 0/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 50/eyes 1 -10000/positionOffset Penny 2 0/positionOffset farmer -2 2/pause 50/positionOffset Penny 2 0/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Penny 2 0/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Penny 2 0/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Penny 2 0/positionOffset farmer -2 0/specificTemporarySprite heart 13 29/pause 1200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 2000/stopSwimming farmer/stopSwimming Penny/end warpOut
